title: CRIT CHAMPION HALP!
body: I'm currently buying runes for a full critical damage rune page, what champs would fit them?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=EvilBird090,realm=EUW,application-id=Wj1wcocU,discussion-id=gnQ3Mmtm,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-12T21:49:44.283+0000)
>
> I&#039;m currently buying runes for a full critical damage rune page, what champs would fit them?

Try Gangplank his Damage based on Critdamage and Attackdamage ;)
You can also try the Runepage on Yasuo to get an early Powerspike (his passive doubles his critchance).
